items: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and hold a dumbbell in each hand with your palms facing forward.
Keep your elbows close to your sides and slowly lift the dumbbells towards your shoulders, while exhaling.
Pause for a moment at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the dumbbells back down to the starting position, while inhaling.
Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

content.title: Dumbbell Standing Biceps Curl Form & Visual

items: Targets the biceps brachii, brachialis, and brachioradialis muscles
Can be done with a variety of weights and equipment, making it accessible for all fitness levels
Can be easily modified to target different areas of the biceps
Helps to improve overall arm definition and aesthetics
